chemaxon.marvin.modules
Class MacroMolecule.HeteroComponent

java.lang.Object
  chemaxon.marvin.modules.MacroMolecule.Component
      chemaxon.marvin.modules.MacroMolecule.HeteroComponent
Enclosing class:
MacroMolecule
public class MacroMolecule.HeteroComponent
extends MacroMolecule.Component

This class specializes the Component class to represent ligands, ions and water molecules.

MacroMolecule.HeteroComponent

public MacroMolecule.HeteroComponent()

MacroMolecule.HeteroComponent

public MacroMolecule.HeteroComponent(java.lang.String hetId,
                                     char chainId,
                                     int seqNum,
                                     char iCode,
                                     int numHetAtoms)
Creates a HeteroComponent to represent a ligand with a given identification code, chain code, sequence number, insertion code. Internal storage space is allocate for the specified number of atoms.

Parameters:
hetId - hetero group id
chainId - chain id
seqNum - sequence number
iCode - insertion code
numHetAtoms - total number of atoms in this group

MacroMolecule.HeteroComponent

public MacroMolecule.HeteroComponent(int waterCount)
Creates a hetero group to store the given number of water molecules.

Parameters:
waterCount - number of water molecules

public java.lang.String getAtomLabel(int atomIndex)
Gets the label of the specified atom.

Overrides:
getAtomLabel in class MacroMolecule.Component
Parameters:
atomIndex - index of the atom queried
Returns:

addAtom

public void addAtom(int serial,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    int resSeqNo,
                    char iCode,
                    float x,
                    float y,
                    float z,
                    java.lang.String element,
                    int charge)
Adds a new atom to the hetero group.

Parameters:
serial - serial number of the atom
name - name (like OG2)
resSeqNo - residue sequence number
iCode - optional insertion code
x - first coordinate
y - second coordinate
z - third coordinate
element - element symbol
charge - charge as given in PDB

merge

public void merge(MacroMolecule.HeteroComponent newPart,
                  int myAtom,
                  int otherAtom)
Merges another hetero group into the current HeteroComponent. The two parts are connected by a new (single) bond between two specified atoms.

Parameters:
newPart - the newly added part
myAtom - atom of the current object to be connected
otherAtom - atom of newPart

fixBonds

protected void fixBonds(boolean fixBondTypes,
                        boolean hydrogenize,
                        boolean addLP)
Sets bonds types based on geometry. PDB file contains no information about the type of bond between two connected atoms, thus bond order is estimated based on geometry, primarily the length of the bond.
Optinally missing hydrogen atoms as well as lone electrone pairs can be added to the hetero group. Hydrogen posidtions are not optimesed in ideal intra/inter molecular h-bond directions.
Distances based partly on Amber 94 force field parameters as well as on standard bond lengths.
